name: Scarf Cat (demo)
description:
Game Project 2: Scarf Cat

Based on Shaun Spalding's GMS2 Action RPG tutorial.

Welcome to the demo of Scarf Cat Game! This is my second ever game project and I'm very excited about it. That said, I know it's far from perfect - so please let me know your thoughts (especially any bugs you find, so I can practise squashing them).

THE STORY

You're a cat. That lovely orange cat nearby seems to want something. Better go talk to them and find out?

movement arrow keys

attack shift

roll/talk/pick up/throw space

switch equipped item q/e

use equipped item ctrl

pause (VERY buggy) tab

quit (instantly) esc
